content: HL7 invites you to take a survey concerning use of our FHIR standard around the world. Your responses will help guide the development of the FHIR standard in the coming years to ensure that the FHIR communityâ€™s needs are being met. Please use the following link below to access the survey: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/CMGHT2F
Hi Grahame, did we get many responses to the survey and do we plan to do a follow up to see how the uptake is progressing. Thx

We had a very good response, and plan to reach out to respondents probably early next year. We still need to post results of the first survey (my bad). Certainly open to suggestions about additional information to gather.
Suggestions should be made to Wayne's attention on #social
